Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is very coarse, interior very worn, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393188) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393188)
